company.about:
ECOVIS Al Sabti, in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, is a member firm of the ECOVIS International network. ECOVIS is a leading global consulting firm rooted in Continental Europe, operates across more than 95 countries with a team of 11000 professionals. The firm provides a range of professional services including Audit and Assurance, Financial Advisory, Risk Management, Cybersecurity, Business Continuity, Data Management, Technology, Tax Consulting, and Accounting Services to clients in various industries. 

ECOVIS is devoted to delivering top-quality, tailored solutions to clients, utilizing its global network of experts and local market insights to assist clients in achieving their business goals. ECOVIS is renowned for its innovative client service approach and dedication to excellence. 

A distinctive feature of ECOVIS is their ability to combine personalized advice at the local level with the comprehensive expertise of a diverse global network of professionals.
